title: Biography
writtenBy: Written by Bob Smith on November 16, 2012
paragraphs: Billy Joe Crawford is born May 16, 1982. He is a Filipino-American songwriter and a bilingual singer. His second language is English and he is conversational in French. In 1996, he danced with Michael Jackson onstage when he was 14 years old at the MTV Video Music Awards.

He recorded his first album when he was 15-years-old. His album Ride called "Trackin'" released in 2001 put Crawford at the top of the French charts. In 2002, Crawford was back on the scene with his second album, Ride which was certified gold in France. He toured during the summer with the L5 in France

Crawford did not receive significant media attention after the Big City Tour 2005. He decided to reside in the Philippines while he spent most of his career in Europe. His stay in the Philippines for his Move TV show gave Billy friendly connections with many other Filipino actors.
